definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: On May 1, most of the oil slick was southeast of the Mississippi Delta.
sentences.chinese: 5月1日时，大部分浮油位于密西西比三角洲东南部。

sentences.english: A city of northern Mississippi south-southeast of Memphis, Tennessee.
sentences.chinese: 密西西比南部一城市，位于纳西州孟斐斯东南偏南。

sentences.english: Let freedom ring from every hill and mole- hill of Mississippi.
sentences.chinese: 让自由从密西西比每座山头和小丘响起。

sentences.english: The climax of this civilization was the Mississippian culture.
sentences.chinese: 这个文明的鼎盛即密西西比文化。

sentences.english: Mississippi sword-boat, ranked fourth world 6262 kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 密西西比全长6262千米，名列世界第四。

sentences.english: My first job was with an optical company in Jackson, Mississippi.
sentences.chinese: 我的第一份工作是在密西西比杰克逊的一家眼镜店。

sentences.english: The university is the oldest land-grant college west of the Mississippi.
sentences.chinese: 这所大学是密西西比以西最早接受政府赠地的大学。

sentences.english: Bulls have been found thousands of miles upstream in both the Mississippi and Amazon Rivers.
sentences.chinese: 牛鲨能逆流而上数千英里进入密西西比和亚马逊河。

sentences.english: Grant's besieging campaign secured the entire creek for the Union.
sentences.chinese: 格兰特的维克伯格战役为联邦挽救了整个密西西比。

sentences.english: The northwestern tip of the oil slick almost touches the Mississippi Delta.
sentences.chinese: 海面浮油西北方的尖端几乎触及密西西比三角洲。

sentences.english: Grant's besieging war secured the entire river for the Union.
sentences.chinese: 格兰特的维克伯格战役为联邦挽救了整个密西西比。

sentences.english: Land subsidence in the Mississippi delta is largely caused by human interference.
sentences.chinese: 密西西比三角洲地表的下陷主要是人为因素。

sentences.english: And he’s still in Forest, Mississippi. Playing golf.
sentences.chinese: 他仍然住在密西西比的佛罗斯特，经常会去打高尔夫。

sentences.english: I also want to thank the University of Mississippi for hosting us tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我也要感谢今晚容纳我们的密西西比大学。

pinyin: Lu4 yi4 si1 an1 na4 zhou1
Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 zhou1
Xi1 Fu2 ji2 ni2 ya4 zhou1
